name: Prasinophobia
description:
Discover The Secrets Of Thomas Green And His Horrible Past While Escaping His House Of Traps And Monsters! With Every Part Of The House Being Unique And Filled With Lore. But Be Warned That There Are No Checkpoints! When You Die You Return To The Title Screen, do you have the skill and determination to escape Prasinophobia?

Controls

Movement - W A S D

Interact - E

Your Goal Is To Explore And Do Objectives

COMING SOON

Prasinophobia HIDE N SEEK

This Will Be A Two Player Split Screen Game!
